definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Now the number has reached closely to 250, half of which have direct investment in sino-foreign joint ventures.
sentences.chinese: 其中有半數直接投資於中外合資企業。

sentences.english: By 1916, more than half the states held presidential primaries.
sentences.chinese: 到1916年，有半數以上的州舉行總統初選。

sentences.english: Almost half of children regularly breathe air polluted by tobacco smoke.
sentences.chinese: 近半數兒童經常呼吸遭受菸草煙霧污染的空氣。

sentences.english: More than half had postgraduate degrees.
sentences.chinese: 超過半數以上擁有研究生學位。

sentences.english: Women head investment banking operations at Kotak Mahindra and JPMorgan Chase and the equities division of Icici. Half of the deputy governors at the Reserve Bank of India are women.
sentences.chinese: 印度儲備銀行半數以上的副理事都是由女性擔任。

sentences.english: And, the share of the Asian test-takers who are women is fast approaching 50%.
sentences.chinese: 而且來自亞洲的考生中，女性比例正在迅速接近半數。

sentences.english: The population of Normandy, which saw most of the fighting, halved.
sentences.chinese: 經歷了大部分戰鬥的諾曼底人，半數死亡。

sentences.english: Half the garrison are on duty.
sentences.chinese: 有半數衛戍部隊在執勤。

sentences.english: Almost all of the animals and more than half of the higher plants are diploid.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎全部的動物和過半數的高等植物都是二倍體。

sentences.english: And half lethal dose was several hundred folds than the clinical dose.
sentences.chinese: 半數致死量是推薦臨牀劑量的幾百倍。

sentences.english: Nearly half Chinese multi-millionaires consider immigration, what are they afraid of?
sentences.chinese: 中國近半數千萬富豪考慮移民他們在怕些什麼？

sentences.english: More than half the workers and staff members in this mill are women.
sentences.chinese: 這個工廠過半數的職工是婦女。

sentences.english: The host threw half the amount at the driver and told him never to return.
sentences.chinese: 他把錢鈔的半數扔給司機，告訴他永遠別再回來。

sentences.english: You could put half of Trump"s supporters into what I call the basket of deplorables."
sentences.chinese: 特朗普的半數支持者都是‘一籮筐可憐蟲’。

sentences.english: The board of supervisors shall have one chairman who is to be elected by more than half of all the supervisors.
sentences.chinese: 監事會設主席一人，由全體監事過半數選舉產生。

sentences.english: Half of patients have polymyalgia rheumatica.
sentences.chinese: 半數以上的病人有風溼性多肌痛。
